text: Razve khotel by kto-nibud' iz vas obladat' sadom, polnym pal'm i vinogradnykh loz, v kotorom by tekli ruch'i i v kotorom by byli vsyakiye plody; i nastupila by starost' v to vremya, kak u nego byli malyye deti; i naletel by uragan, i molniya sozhgla by etot sad, tak nuzhnyy khozyainu v starosti? Takim budet tot, kto dayot milostynyu i soprovozhdayet yeyo poprokami, obidoy i litsemeriyem, perechorkivaya to dobroye, chto on sdelal. Tak raz"yasnyayet Allakh vam Svoi znameniya, - mozhet byt', vy urazumeyete
